p: In this outbreak, we also found that for both the index case and the hospitalized case neutrophils increased and /or lymphocytes in the peripheral blood decreased. Studies on other respiratory viruses, such as influenza virus, respiratory syncytial virus, or human rhinovirus, have shown that an increase in neutrophils has a significant role in limiting virus replication [ 44, 45]. Thus, the increase in neutrophils observed here may have limited and resulted in milder clinical symptoms in this outbreak.
